evidences.name: Attorney's Badge
evidences.description1: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.

evidences.name: Cell Phone
evidences.obtained: One of my possessions.  → Received from Maggey Byrde.
evidences.description1: I found this in my pocket, but I don't remember what it means or how it got there.
evidences.description2: Maggey found this in the park. She got in contact with its owner, but they never showed.

evidences.name: Dustin's Autopsy Report
evidences.description1: Time of death: 9/6 at 6:28 PM. Cause: Broken neck. Body was also covered in bruises.

evidences.name: Glasses
evidences.description1: Found under the victim's body. Pieces of near-sighted lenses were found nearby.

evidences.name: Crime Photo 1
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Payne.
evidences.description1: The victim fell from the walking path above. The photo shows the body of Dustin Prince as he was found after being pushed from the upper area of the park. There is a phone booth in the background.

evidences.name: Crime Photo 2
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Prosecutor Payne.
evidences.description1: A photo of the area around the victim's hand. It shows the body of Dustin Prince having written 'Maggie' in the sand.

evidences.name: Baseball Glove
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: A birthday present from Maggey to the victim. It was custom-made.

evidences.name: Phoenix's Business Card
evidences.description1: It's my business card. I handwrote my cell phone number on the back.

evidences.name: Names List
evidences.description1: A list of unfamiliar names and phone numbers. Members of a con artists' group...?
evidences.description2: A list of con artists and their phone numbers stored on the cell phone Maggey found.

evidences.name: Judge's Business Card
evidences.description1: It's written in fancy script. The ink is strong and clear, but I still can't read it.

evidences.name: Attorney's Badge
evidences.description1: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.

evidences.name: Guidemap (Fey Manor)
evidences.description1: A diagram of Fey Manor. Meditation room to the south. Channeling chamber north of meditation room. Side room to the east, have to go through winding path from meditation room to get to side room.

evidences.name: Maya's Magatama
evidences.description1: Slightly translucent. It's small, but it has a deep, profound aura about it.
evidences.description2: Slightly translucent. It radiates softly with a mysterious light.

evidences.name: Newspaper Clipping 1
evidences.obtained: Retrieved at the Wright & Co. Law Offices.
evidences.description1: One year ago on May 2nd, 14 patients died from malpractice at Grey Surgical Clinic.

evidences.name: Folding Screen
evidences.description1: About 8 inches off the ground is a small hole that looks like a bullet hole.

evidences.name: Black Key
evidences.description1: An old steel key. A green jewel is set in the center of the key's grip.

evidences.name: Newspaper Clipping 2
evidences.obtained: Received from Detective Gumshoe.  → Received from Director Hotti.
evidences.description1: Mimi Miney, nurse at Grey Surgical Clinic, died after falling asleep at the wheel.
evidences.description2: Articles about the car accident. This is a newspaper clipping about the death of Mimi Miney, the nurse who worked at Turner Grey's clinic. It reads how Mimi died as a result of her car crashing when she fell asleep at the wheel and Director Hotti fills in some further parts of the article later on. The content is as follows-Highway of Nightmares-May 24 - Late last night, two women's car crashed into a highway center divide. One of the women was not able to escape the flaming wreckage and died at the site. Ongoing investigation has revealed that the driver had fallen asleep at the wheel. -Ms. Ini Miney Holds Interview About Crash- I was like, really tired and I dropped off to sleep. Then there was this crash, and like, I woke up in a huge sea of flames. I was like, still half-asleep, but I opened the right door and like, got out. I don't, like, remember anything else. -Doctor Lurking in the Shadows? If Ms. Ini Miney is to be believed, the one driving the car was her sister, Mimi Miney. Mimi Miney was the nurse at Grey Surgical Clinic where 14 patients were accidentally overdosed to their death. Is this then, just a mere coincidence...?

evidences.name: Floor Plans (Crime Scene)
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence during the trial.
evidences.description1: A diagram of the Channeling Chamber. A four sectioned mat in front of a platform at the head.

evidences.name: Dr. Grey's Autopsy Report
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: After being stabbed in the chest, he was shot in the forehead at point-blank.
evidences.description2: Stabbed in chest then shot at point-blank. Gunpowder residue around bullet hole.

evidences.name: Pistol
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Murder weapon. Was Grey's. Two shots fired. Bears Maya's and Grey's fingerprints.

evidences.name: Knife
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Murder weapon. A small fruit knife. Belongs to the Fey's. Bears Maya's fingerprints.

evidences.name: Maya's Costume
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Clothes Maya was wearing at the time of the murder. There are blood splatters on it.
evidences.description2: Clothes Maya was wearing at the time of the murder. This is Maya's robe that she wore on the day of Turner Grey's murder. It is stained with blood splatter and a bullet hole is present in the sleeve. The robe is otherwise clean. It is purple in color.

evidences.name: Lotta's Photo 1
evidences.description1: A picture taken at the murder scene. This is a photo taken by Lotta Hart of Maya Fey after they break into the Channeling Chamber when they hear a gunshot. Turner Grey is lying dead on the floor after being shot.

evidences.name: Lotta's Photo 2
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Franziska von Karma.
evidences.description1: A picture taken at the murder scene. This is the second photo taken by Lotta Hart of Maya Fey after they break into the Channeling Chamber when they hear a gunshot. Turner Grey is lying dead on the floor after being shot behind her.

evidences.name: Sacred Urn
evidences.description1: Ami Fey's spirit is sealed within. It's chipped and cracked all over.
evidences.description2: Broken by Pearl right before the murder. Under repair in the hallway until police came.

evidences.name: Cloth Scrap
evidences.description1: Unburned remains found inside the garden incinerator. Small amount of blood is on it.

evidences.name: Pearl's Ball
evidences.description1: Pearl's favorite toy. She was playing with this at the time of the murder, it seems.

evidences.name: Clothing Box
evidences.description1: There is a hole that looks like a bullet hole about 8 inches off the ground.

evidences.name: License Photo
evidences.description1: Ini's photo for her driver's license. Director Hotti's treasured possession.

evidences.name: Attorney's Badge
evidences.description1: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.

evidences.name: Maya's Magatama
evidences.description1: Slightly translucent. It radiates softly with a mysterious light.

evidences.name: Crime Photo
evidences.description1: A picture of the crime scene. A person is lying on a case in the snow. There victim’s footprints leading to where he is are visible.

evidences.name: Silk Hat
evidences.description1: Made-to-order fedora that is a symbol of Max's fabulousness. Found at the crime scene.

evidences.name: Max G. Promo Poster
evidences.obtained: Received from the Big Top - Ringmaster's Room.
evidences.description1: Emblazoned with Max's three famous symbols. A silk hat, cloak and white roses.

evidences.name: Ringmaster's Papers
evidences.obtained: Received from the Big Top - Ringmaster's Room.
evidences.description1: Documents related to Max's salary negotiations. He got an enormous raise 1 week ago.

evidences.name: Circus Map
evidences.description1: A map of the Berry Big Circus. The circus is depicted on the left. The ring master’s room and cafeteria are on the northeast of the circus. To the right is the lodging house. Moe is on the first floor and Acro is on the third.

evidences.name: Broken Bottle
evidences.obtained: Retrieved from the Big Top - Cafeteria.
evidences.description1: An orange juice bottle that was found broken on the cafeteria floor.

evidences.name: Trilo Quist
evidences.obtained: Retrieved from the Big Top - Ringmaster's Room.
evidences.description1: A ventriloquist's puppet. An operatic tenor who doubles as Ben's sidekick.

evidences.name: Money the Monkey
evidences.description1: A monkey who takes care of Acro. Habitually gathers all sorts of shiny objects.

evidences.name: Ring
evidences.description1: A cheap ring with an eerie sparkle. "From T to R" is engraved on it.

evidences.name: Russell's Autopsy Report
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Time of death: 10:15 PM. Cause: Blunt force trauma to the back of the head.

evidences.name: Wooden Box
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: The victim was hunched over this 20 lb. box. It was locked by a small key.

evidences.name: Small Seasoning Bottle
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Found inside the Wooden Box the victim was hunched over. It contains pepper.

evidences.name: Grand Prix Photo
evidences.description1: Photo of Max's Award Ceremony. Max is standing at the center holding a trophy. Two girls stand to either side. The bust of max is right next to him.

evidences.name: Max G. Bust
evidences.obtained: Retrieved from the Big Top - Cafeteria.
evidences.description1: Bronze statue taken from the cafeteria before the crime. It looks rather heavy.

evidences.name: Note
evidences.obtained: Received from Moe.  → Retrieved from the Big Top - Ringmaster's Room.
evidences.description1: Posted in the Cafeteria on the day of the crime, then torn. States: "To The Murderer!"
evidences.description2: Torn by Ringmaster, found in his tailcoat pocket. Reads To The Murderer! You haven't forgotten what happened six months ago, have you? I have conclusive evidence of what took place. Meet at 10:00 PM tonight at the lodging house plaza.
evidences.description3: Found in Regina's pocket on the morning of crime. Reads To The Murderer! You haven't forgotten what happened six months ago, have you? I have conclusive evidence of what took place. Meet at 10:00 PM tonight at the lodging house plaza.
evidences.description4:
Placed by Acro in Regina's pocket on morning of crime. Reads To The Murderer!

You haven't forgotten what
happened six months ago,
have you? I have conclusive
evidence of what took place.

Meet at 10:00 PM tonight
at the lodging house plaza.

evidences.name: Stage Costume
evidences.description1: A shiny spangled vest. It's not Maya's size at all.

evidences.name: Léon
evidences.description1: The animal show's lion. Shot by the Ringmaster six months ago for biting a performer.

evidences.name: Scarf
evidences.description1: Bat's scarf. Stained with his blood and a small quantity of pepper.

evidences.name: Attorney's Badge
evidences.description1: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.

evidences.name: Maya's Magatama
evidences.description1: Slightly translucent. It radiates softly with a mysterious light.

evidences.name: The Nickel Samurai
evidences.description1: A glossy photo Maya pushed onto me. A picture describing the nickel samurai costume.

evidences.name: Press Conference Ticket
evidences.description1: Seems like the Nickel Samurai is to confess something after the post-ceremony stage show.

evidences.name: Radio Transceiver
evidences.description1: Originally from the Bellboy. It can transmit and receive signals over great distances.
evidences.description2: Originally from Maya's kidnapper, who goes by the name of "De Killer".

evidences.name: Lotta's Camera
evidences.description1: A very expensive item valued at $1,600. It was stolen around the time of the murder.
evidences.description2: Stolen on the night of the murder. Tabloid article about the victim was in the case.

evidences.name: Hotel Guidemap
evidences.description1: Map of the Gatewater Hotel around the crime scene. A path from the west leads to the viola hall. To the north of the path is engarde and to the south corrida. East of viola hall is the lobby.

evidences.name: Guitar Case
evidences.description1: Found next to the victim. Empty. There is some water, but only on top of the lid.
evidences.description2: Empty. There is some water, but only on top of the lid. Bears Corrida's fingerprints.

evidences.name: Wine Glass
evidences.description1: Found next to the victim. It's filled with tomato juice. No sign it's been drank.
evidences.description2: Found next to the victim. It's filled with tomato juice. Bears Andrews' fingerprints.

evidences.name: Crime Photo
evidences.description1: Photo of Juan Corrida's murder scene. The victim sits on a chair in a samurai outfit. There is a stab wound on his chest. A glass of juice sits behind him on the dresser. A full bottle of juice sits on the desk in front of him. A open guitar case lies on the floor next to him. Next to the guitar case are the remains of a smashed vase that has stained the carpet with water.

evidences.name: Autograph
evidences.description1: Juan Corrida's autograph. "To my dearest Wendy" is written on it.

evidences.name: Magazine Clipping
evidences.description1:
An "article" from the tabloid "Gossip Land". The contents of the article follow: *Jammin' Midnight Rendezvous!?*

A super-star in an ultra-hot, mega-secret
love scandal!?

Reliable sources say that Juan Corrida
has been getting in close with the
mysterious, yet beautiful manager to the
stars, Ms. A.A.!

evidences.name: Suicide Report
evidences.description1: Deceased: Celeste InpaxFound by: Juan CorridaWas her suicide note hidden?

evidences.name: Attempted Suicide Report
evidences.description1: Attempter: Adrian AndrewsReason: Shock from Celeste Inpax's suicide.

evidences.name: Juan's Autopsy Report
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Time of death: 8:15 PMCause: Strangled with a scarf, then stabbed with a knife.

evidences.name: Knife
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Bears the victim's blood and Engarde's fingerprints. In the grip, "Gatewater" is engraved.

evidences.name: Jammin' Ninja's Button
evidences.description1: Was ripped from his costume. Is covered in Corrida's blood. Found in Engarde's "hakama".

evidences.name: Lotta's Photo
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Miles Edgeworth.
evidences.description1: Picture taken in the Hallway right after the murder. A person in samurai garb stands outside the door.

evidences.name: Picture Card
evidences.description1: Was placed next to the victim at the time of the murder. Ms. Andrews was carrying it.

evidences.name: Letter of Introduction
evidences.description1: Received from Edgeworth. Allows bearer to freely investigate the crime scene.

evidences.name: Matt's Note
evidences.description1: "Please feed my cat, Shoe. My house is just a little ways down from the hotel."

evidences.name: Spy Camera
evidences.description1: Set to record the victim's room from 8 PM for 1 hour. Was running at time of murder.

evidences.name: Transmitter
evidences.description1: Changes the footage taken by the spy camera into radio waves and transmits the data.

evidences.name: Stuffed Bear
evidences.description1: The spy camera was set in its right eye. Found in the victim's room.

evidences.name: Credit Card Receipt
evidences.description1: A receipt for $3,800. Proof Engarde bought a stuffed bear identical to one in evidence.

evidences.name: Figurine
evidences.obtained: Retrieved from Engarde Mansion - Living Room.
evidences.description1: A wooden bear-shaped figurine. It's covered in many thin cuts.
evidences.description2: A wooden puzzle with a hollow inside. Only Corrida and Andrews know how to open it.

evidences.name: Celeste's Photo
evidences.obtained: Retrieved from Engarde Mansion - Wine Cellar.
evidences.description1: Found at Engarde Mansion. "With Love... Celeste" is written on it.

evidences.name: Celeste's Suicide Note
evidences.description1: Found inside the Figurine. It tells of Engarde's horrible misdeeds.

evidences.name: Pistol
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Franziska von Karma.
evidences.description1: <if not asked for details> One of the items retrieved from De Killer's hideout. Nothing else is known.  <if asked for details> A small caliber pistol that is thought to have been fired by De Killer at Franziska.

evidences.name: Video Tape
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Franziska von Karma.
evidences.description1: <if not asked for details> One of the items retrieved from De Killer's hideout. Nothing else is known.  <if asked for details> One of the items retrieved. De Killer violently tried to recover it. Contents unknown.

evidences.name: Bellboy's Uniform
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Franziska von Karma.
evidences.description1: <if not asked for details> One of the items retrieved from De Killer's hideout. Nothing else is known.<if asked for details> Worn by De Killer on the night of the murder. One of its special buttons is missing.

evidences.name: Whip
evidences.description1: Thrown away by Franziska von Karma, it has a certain mysterious nostalgia to it.
